alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Ellis and west central Woodward Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 639 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Woodward to 6 miles southwest of Fort Supply. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Fort Supply and Tangier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
